text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pct/CodeSystem/PCTOrganizationTypeCS defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
institutional-submitter Institutional GFE SubmitterInstitutional GFE Submitter
professional-submitter Professional GFE SubmitterProfessional GFE Submitter
billing-provider Billing ProviderBilling Provider

name: PCTOrganizationTypeCS
title: PCT Organization Type Code System
publisher: HL7 International - Financial Management Work Group

contact.name: HL7 International - Financial Management Work Group

description: Organization Type codes for describing the type of organizations involved in the PCT GFE process
